summary: Dwemer home, partially above/below ground. Includes home, training area, display area and even a small zoo! REQUIRES Dawnguard and Dragonborn!
descriptionHtml:
This mod requires both Dawnguard and Dragonborn! My first mod, a mostly underground dwemer player home with some unique additions including a training area, a display area, an explorable sunken tower and even a small zoo! The home is found north-west of Falkreath in the lake. It includes the standard amenities, a crafting area(atop the tower), enchanting/alchemy area. It also includes a library, kitchen/dining room and a bathroom with working shower/tub. I've included a large display area with mannequins and a unique magic weapon display(shown in pictures.) The display rooms include a small civil war room and a large area for storing daedric artifacts and also a dragon room with spots for your dragon priest masks and dragon claws. There is also a training area, complete with an arena-type room where you can spawn various enemies to fight you or each other. The training room also includes a gauntlet, a special challenge just for the player with a nice reward at the end. The bestiary(or zoo) houses Skyrim's various beasts for your viewing pleasure. I tried to make this mod as lore friendly as possibly, but I'm no expert! The house is done, however I may eventually add more to the mod, like servants and guards and perhaps a quest to go along with the home. It's my first mod, and constructive feedback is more than welcome, also let me know if there's anything you'd like to see added, just don't be a dick about it. :)

Special thanks to Tbrough10 and mkprovince for feedback/testing.

NOTE: this mod shouldn't conflict with other mods except mods that modify the real estate around the lake northwest of Falkreath. Ex: The Moon and Stars mod.

UPDATES
Version 1.1
I updated the Navmesh in multiple areas so it should be more follower friendly, I'd still maybe leave them behind for the gauntlet in the training rooms and the sunken tower though.

I also changed the bestiary(zoo). It's no longer one large room as this was causing lag for some users, it is now two separate rooms, I've also removed the rabbits as separating the rooms made it necessary, they didn't do anything anyway. :)
author: Dallytay
